name: Gluck
description:
Gluck is a short adventure game that advances the story while digging in the mine.
Use pickaxes and conveyors to cash in the ore you extract, and somehow survive in the underground life of the mine.

Story

.You are posing as a rookie miner and set out for the deepest part of the mine in order to restore the water that was gushing out of the village.
Relying on your fellow miners, you dig your way through the mine, but the mine is a dangerous place. Deal with trouble and restore the water.

Be safe....
The ore you dig up with pickaxes and conveyors is sorted using our proprietary metallic electromagnetic tractor.
Your share of the ore, correctly sorted, is your share, but unfortunately you should not expect to be paid. You will have to pay for your own helmet batteries, tools, and meals.
The miners will greet you with sometimes optimism, sometimes seriousness, and sometimes severity.

Features of this game

.
  • Selective conversations with heartwarming characters.
  • There is no combat.
  • Action of digging through ragged, crumbling rocks with a pickaxe (you can dig through the dots)
  • Unusual ore dressing methods and trolley transportation.
  • Simple puzzle-solving elements.
  • All texts are in Japanese hiragana or katakana.

A story about a villager.
The best rice cake maker in the village is going to stop making rice cakes! The reason why he can't make rice cakes anymore must be that mining company!
Because ever since that company was established, the water in the village has been getting scarcer and scarcer! It's definitely a bad company!
